title: Pilot
description: In a two-hour special, Dionne Warwick, Glen Campbell and the Solid Gold Dancers count down the top 50 hits of 1979.

title: Co-Host Gladys Night and the Pips
Episode #1.18
description: Guest co-host is UK pop star Cliff Richard. Con Funk Shun performs their top 40 and R&B #8 hit tune "Too Tight." Also stars ventriloquist and comedian Jay Johnson from "Soap" (1977) who also plays Bob The Dummy.
